name: Windy Carpentry
description:
This game was made using Scratch 3.0 for a 72h Jam

STORY
Jake is a carpenter inside a small town. One day a terrible storm hits this town but jake's house stays in place.. but for how long.

Jake comes up with a great idea when he sees debree flying into his house!

He starts rebuilding furniture for people in an effort to put everything back into place using the debree.

You are this amazing carpenter... but the question is how many people will you help before everything flies away

CREDIT
Game by DrSallan
Music Generated on Ecrett Music
